General.Name: Nanjing Tanker Corp
General.Description: Nanjing Tanker Corporation provides oil tanker transportation services in China and internationally. The company transports crude and refined oil, and gas; and chemicals, such as PX and glacial acetic acid. It also offers crew labor services; and wholesales gasoline, kerosene, and diesel. Nanjing Tanker Corporation was formerly known as Nanjing Water Transportation Industry Co., Ltd. Nanjing Tanker Corporation was incorporated in 1993 and is based in Nanjing, China.

1.Name: Mr. Hui  Shen
1.Title: Chief Accountant & Acting Sec. of Board
